title: Alpha Midnight?
content:
Does anyone know if there’s a digital version of the ALPHA MIDNIGHT font somewhere? Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080131231039im_/http:/typophile.com/files/alpha_4983.jpg)

 [‹ Hey, looking for embossed sans serif, seventies-ish vintage.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080131231039/http:/typophile.com/node/40654 "Go to previous forum topic") [kellymom font - Need some help IDing the font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080131231039/http:/typophile.com/node/40651 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bistis6

comments.content: No, but you can get close if you add pylons to [Rhode](http://web.archive.org/web/20080131231039/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/rhode_normal/?sample_text=STOP&sample_size=96).
